name: AtherosclerosisAndPeripheralArterialDisease
title: Atherosclerosis and Peripheral Arterial Disease
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to represent concepts for diagnosis of atherosclerosis or peripheral arterial disease (PAD).),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to Diagnosis.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent conditions that indicate arterial blood flow is restricted.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
